00028 string toLower(const char* s) {
00029     string str(s);
00030     for(size_t i=0; i<str.size(); ++i)
00031     {
00032         char c = str[i];
00033         if((c >= 'A') && (c <= 'Z'))
00034         {
00035             c += 'a' - 'A';
00036             str[i] = c;
00037         }
00038     }
00039     return str;
00040 }
00041 } // namespace

00052 void Knowledge::setEncodeType(EncodeType type)
00053 {
00054     if( encodeType_ != type )
00055     {
00056                 encodeType_ = type;
00057         onEncodeTypeChange( type );

00061 Knowledge::EncodeType Knowledge::getEncodeType() const

00066 Knowledge::EncodeType Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(const char* encodeStr)
00067 {
00068     string lower = toLower(encodeStr);
00069     if(lower == "euc-jp" || lower == "eucjp")
00070     {
00071         return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP;
00072     }
00073     else if(lower == "shift-jis" || lower == "sjis")
00074     {
00075         return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS;
00076     }
00077     else if(lower == "utf-8" || lower == "utf8")
00078     {
00079         return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8;
00080     }
00081 
00082     // unknown character encoding type
00083     return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM;
00084 }
